languages.text: "Урбенд Драйвстем, вы обвинили род Версериан в нарушениях, которые в действительности были вызваны грубой ошибкой вашего отпрыска".

traits.locale_text: "Вы допустили непростительную халатность, обвинив род Версериан в нарушениях логистики, которые в действительности были вызваны грубой ошибкой вашего отпрыска и попытками скрыть это".

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of violations that were in truth the result of a grave error committed by your son."
languages.original_text: "Урбенд Драйвстем, вы обвинили род Версериан в нарушениях, которые в действительности были вызваны грубой ошибкой вашего отпрыска".

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of the violations that were actually the result of the grave error of your son."
"Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of the violations that were actually the result of the grave error of your son."
"Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of the violations that were actually the result of the grave error committed by your son."

"Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of violations that were in truth the result of a grave error committed by your son."
"Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of violations that were in truth the result of a grave error committed by your son."

languages.text: 「アーベント・ドライブステム、お前はウェルザリアン家を違反行為で訴えていたが、それは実のところ、お前の息子がおかした重大ミスから生じた」
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of violations that were in truth the result of a grave error committed by your son."

traits.locale_text: 「アーベント・ドライブステム、お前はウェルザリアン家を違反行為で訴えていたが、それは実のところ、お前の息子がおかした重大ミスから生じた」

languages.text: “厄本·德莱夫斯塔，你指控韦尔森家族犯下的罪行，实际上是你的儿子一手犯下的严重错误。”
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of violations that were in truth the result of a grave error committed by your son."

traits.locale_text: “厄本·德莱夫斯塔，你指控韦尔森家族犯下的罪行，实际上是你的儿子一手犯下的严重错误。”

languages.text: « Urbend Drivestem, vous avez accusé la maison Werserian de crimes qui découlaient en fait d'une erreur commise par votre propre fils. »
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of violations that were in truth the result of a grave error committed by your son."

traits.locale_text: « Urbend Drivestem, vous avez accusé la maison Werserian de crimes qui découlaient en fait d'une erreur commise par votre propre fils. »

languages.text: «Urbend Drivestem, ha acusado a la casa Werserian de los delitos que en realidad fueron consecuencia del grave error de su hijo».
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of violations that were in truth the result of a grave error committed by your son."

traits.locale_text: «Urbend Drivestem, ha acusado a la casa Werserian de los delitos que en realidad fueron consecuencia del grave error de su hijo».

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem, Ihr habt das Haus Werserian der Vergehen bezichtigt, die in Wahrheit nur die Folge eines schweren Fehlers Eures eigenen Sohnes waren."
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of violations that were in truth the result of a grave error committed by your son."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, Ihr habt das Haus Werserian der Vergehen bezichtigt, die in Wahrheit nur die Folge eines schweren Fehlers Eures eigenen Sohnes waren."

languages.text: "Urbend Drivestem, aslen oğlunun sebep olduğu büyük hataların sonucunda ortaya çıkan ihlallerle Werserian Hanesi'ni itham ettin."
languages.original_text: "Urbend Drivestem, you have accused House Werserian of violations that were in truth the result of a grave error committed by your son."

traits.locale_text: "Urbend Drivestem, aslen oğlunun sebep olduğu büyük hataların sonucunda ortaya çıkan ihlallerle Werserian Hanesi'ni itham ettin."
